overview: Syifa dreams of a beautiful and vibrant wedding since childhood. After her meeting with Amar, her lover, at the reception strengthens Syifa's spirit that this wedding must be 'PERFECT!' - from the shape of the dream ring, making sure that Amar's waist is at the right size to Amar's best men's height must be even. The situation became even more chaotic when the wedding invitation card was printed incorrectly by Rafi. Every problem arises has caused their trust and feelings of love to fade.
title: 7 Minggu Sebelum Kahwin
